title: SOLD: 1888 N43 Buck Ewing - SGC 35 and SGC 40
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1888 N43 Buck Ewing - SGC 35 and SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Hi - I am looking to sell one of my 1888 N43 Buck Ewings.  Planning to keep one, and will sell either the SGC 35 or the SGC 40 as pictured below.

SGC 40 - Sold

Better / larger scans available - send me a message with your email address and I can send you bigger files to take a better look.

Let me know any questions - thanks for looking!
Scott
